description:
Asyncio is highly efficient in operating within a single thread, making
it exceptionally well-suited for environments with limited resources.

In our product, we leverage Python's asynchronous capabilities to
streamline the decision-making processes of **our robots**. I will
individually introduce **trio** and **trio-util**, as well as anyio and
asyncio, in the presentation.
title: Event-Driven asyncio: A Case Study of Trio's API
